content:
Based on the hypothesis that acidic deblocking causes depurination, the following optimizing advice is provided to improve the target procedure.

In Step 1.3, increase the pH of the 1 M aqueous sodium acetate buffer used to prepare the Cleavage Reagent from pH 5.5 to pH 5.8.
 The optimizing hypothesis is saved to file: Hypothesis-9423
 Rolled back to procedure ID: Protocol-b5fc
